mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_code AS "contractCode", a.supplier_code AS "docSupplier.supCode", a.supplier_name AS "docSupplier.supName", a.sign_date AS "signDate", a.sign_place AS "signPlace", a.period_start AS "periodStart", a.period_end AS "periodEnd", a.setting_type_code AS "docAccmeth.accmethCode", a.setting_type_name AS "docAccmeth.accmethName", a.contrace_create AS "contraceCreate", a.contract_create_date AS "contractCreateDate", a.contract_auditor AS "contractAuditor", a.contract_audit_date AS "contractAuditDate", a.contract_cancel AS "contractCancel", a.contract_cancel_date AS "contractCancelDate", a.remark AS "remark", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_purchase_supplement( contract_code, supplier_code, supplier_name, sign_date, sign_place, period_start, period_end, setting_type_code, setting_type_name, contrace_create, contract_create_date, contract_auditor, contract_audit_date, contract_cancel, contract_cancel_date, remark, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3 ) VALUES ( #{contractCode}, #{docSupplier.supCode}, #{docSupplier.supName}, #{signDate}, #{signPlace}, #{periodStart}, #{periodEnd}, #{docAccmeth.accmethCode}, #{docAccmeth.accmethName}, #{contraceCreate}, #{contractCreateDate}, #{contractAuditor}, #{contractAuditDate}, #{contractCancel}, #{contractCancelDate}, #{remark}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contract_purchase_supplement SET contract_code = #{contractCode}, supplier_code = #{docSupplier.supCode}, supplier_name = #{docSupplier.supName}, sign_date = #{signDate}, sign_place = #{signPlace}, period_start = #{periodStart}, period_end = #{periodEnd}, setting_type_code = #{docAccmeth.accmethCode}, setting_type_name = #{docAccmeth.accmethName}, contrace_create = #{contraceCreate}, contract_create_date = #{contractCreateDate}, contract_auditor = #{contractAuditor}, contract_audit_date = #{contractAuditDate}, contract_cancel = #{contractCancel}, contract_cancel_date = #{contractCancelDate}, remark = #{remark}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3} WHERE id = #{id}
